mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fatal Fingerprints: Dangers...; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 2; "Fatal Fingerprints: Dangers of the Police System"; Discusses portions of Faulds's publication, "Guide to Finger-print Identification", especially the issue of having less than ten fingerprints on record. Reference to another publication is handwritten underneath clipping.; Standard; DF 654
